lead_paragraph: The remains were in a wooded area behind a strip mall in New Britain, Conn., that the authorities said was a dumping ground for a person suspected as a serial killer of seven.

headline.print_headline: Remains of 4 Women Found at Site Linked to a Serial Killer
headline.main: Remains of 4 Women Found at Connecticut Site Tied to Serial Killer

snippet: The remains were in a wooded area behind a strip mall in New Britain, Conn., that the authorities said was a dumping ground for a person suspected as a serial killer of seven.
abstract: Police find remains of four people behind strip mall in New Britain, Conn, same area where partial skeletons of three women were found in 2007; authorities suspect spot is dumping ground for person suspected as serial killer.
